content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to power and is experiencing issues with fluid connections.

### Lab at position(2.5, -12.5)
Currently, there is an attempt to place a lab at this position, but it is obstructed.

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) that is currently not smelting due to no ingredients.

### Furnace at position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of another stone furnace (position 5.0, 5.0) that is also not smelting due to no ingredients.

### Pipe Groups
- PipeGroup at position(-8.5, -6.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-7.5, -7.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-11.5, -4.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-9.5, -5.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-13.5, 23.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-17.5, 25.5)
- PipeGroup at position(-19.5, 27.5)

### Electricity Group
Consists of multiple small electric poles spread across various positions, providing potential connections to the electricity network.

### Copper plate mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that there are no obstructions between the boiler and steam engine when attempting to connect pipes. Check for any entities that may block the connection.

### Errors when placing lab
- Ensure the target position for the lab is clear of obstructions before attempting to place it.

### Errors with steam engine not connected to power
- Verify that the steam engine is properly connected to the electricity network. Check the connections to nearby electric poles and ensure they are functioning.

### General placement errors
- Always check the surrounding area for obstructions before placing any entity to avoid placement failures.
